contributors_section.title: Contributors
contributors_section.main_paragraph: We are grateful to the many developers who have contributed to the development of the various projects that help make up React ChatBotify, as well as authors of themes & plugins who contribute to the available contents today. Your involvement helps keep the platform dynamic and relevant. The list of contributors can be found on the project repositories.
contributors_section.how_to_contribute_body_text.1: Want to contribute to React ChatBotify Gallery? We welcome your involvement! Whether you're submitting a new theme, improving existing plugins, or contributing code, your input helps us grow.
contributors_section.how_to_contribute_body_text.3: for contribution guidelines and to get started.
contributors_section.contact_us_body_text.1: Have questions or want to get in touch? Reach out to us via
contributors_section.contact_us_body_text.3: and stay in touch with the latest updates and community news!

features_section.title: What separates us from the rest
features_section.heading.1: We envision a vibrant community where creativity and collaboration thrive, enabling chatbots to become more customizable and accessible for everyone.

features.title: Extensive Library
features.description: Access a growing collection of themes and plugins.

features.title: Open source
features.description: Created to be open from the get-go: no hidden data scraping or selling your info to third parties.

features.title: Collaborative Community
features.description: Download and integrate themes and plugins with your chatbot effortlessly.

features.title: Community Ratings
features.description: Browse through user ratings to find the most popular and reliable options.

features.title: Easy Integration
features.description: Join a community of like-minded developers, share your own creations, and contribute to the growth of the platform.

features.title: Enhance Functionality
features.description: Easily add new features and improve the user experience of your chatbot.

features.title: Build your own
features.description: Built-in builder to allow you to create a theme: quick and easy.

features.title: Save time
features.description: Utilize pre-built themes and plugins to accelerate your development process.

benefits_section.title: Benefits
benefits_section.body_text.1: Utilize pre-built themes and plugins to accelerate your development process.
benefits_section.body_text.2: Easily add new features and improve the user experience of your chatbot.
benefits_section.body_text.3: Join a community of like-minded developers, share your own creations, and contribute to the growth of the platform.

hero_section.title: Easily customizable open-source chatbots
hero_section.name: React ChatBotify
hero_section.body_text.1: A community-driven platform where developers and enthusiasts can browse, rate, and share custom themes and plugins
hero_section.usedByDevs: Already used by 300+ developers around the world

history_section.title: History and Background
history_section.body_text: React ChatBotify Gallery started as a project to complement the v2 release of React ChatBotify in 2024. It was born out of the need for a centralized repository of chatbot themes and plugins. As more developers began contributing, the platform quickly grew into a vibrant community, constantly evolving to meet the needs of its users.

mission_section.title: Mission and Vision
mission_section.body_text.1: Our mission is to empower developers by providing a centralized hub for sharing and discovering high-quality themes and plugins for React ChatBotify.
mission_section.body_text.2: We envision a vibrant community where creativity and collaboration thrive, enabling chatbots to become more customizable and accessible for everyone.
